name: Pinbounce: Bouncy Balls
description:
- Grab a quick 5 minutes of fun with this hypnotic ball game.
- Drag your finger to throw balls and break different shapes.
- Break as many shapes as you can before they pass the top line.
- The level of shapes will be increased after each round, but your balls increase too!
- Throw the balls with right angles, bounce them and break the shapes, reach the top of the high score!
